# isNaN

> Test if a numeric value is NaN.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isnan = require( '@stdlib/math/base/utils/is-nan' );
```

#### isnan( x )

Tests if a `numeric` value is `NaN`.

``` javascript
var bool = isnan( NaN );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isnan = require( '@stdlib/math/base/utils/is-nan' );

var bool = isnan( NaN );
// returns true

bool = isnan( 5.0 );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
